title: Yeast - The Practical Guide to Beer Fermentation
description:
Yeast: The Practical Guide to Beer Fermentation 

By Chris White and Jamil Zainasheff

Yeast is a resource for brewers of all experience levels. The authors adeptly cover yeast selection, storage and handling of yeast cultures, how to culture yeast and the art of rinsing/washing yeast cultures.  

Sections on how to set up a yeast lab, the basics of fermentation science and how it affects your beer, plus step by step procedures, equipment lists and a guide to troubleshooting are included.
